candidates.title: Update `reis` to 0.4, with more concise API
candidates.body: The API `reis` provides could still be improved, but it's a bit simpler to use.

candidates.title: activation_token: Provide GTK 4 helper
candidates.body:
cc @jsparber

I noticed that `cargo clippy --features=gtk4 -- -W clippy::pedantic` will complain:

```
warning: casting from `*const glib::Class<gtk4::gdk4::AppLaunchContext>` to a more-strictly-aligned pointer (`*mut gtk4::gio::gio_sys::GAppLaunchContextClass`) (1 < 8 bytes)
  --> src/activation_token/mod.rs:63:17
   |
63 |                 std::ptr::addr_of!((*context.class().parent()?)) as *mut _;
   |                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#cast_ptr_alignment
   = note: `-W clippy::cast-ptr-alignment` implied by `-W clippy::pedantic`
   = help: to override `-W clippy::pedantic` add `#[allow(clippy::cast_ptr_alignment)]`
```

candidates.title: Drop async-std crate
candidates.body:
The async-std crate didn't had a release for 1 1/2 years. It also pulls in a lot of dependencies that are usually not needed. The Path::exists() feature of async-std is just using spawn_blocking around the std metadata function and therefore settling on a specific executor and spawning a bunch of threads that might not be needed.

Therefore I replaced all uses of async-std with the crates from which async-std is build and that are well maintained.

candidates.title: Fix docs.rs
candidates.body: A typo in `Cargo.toml` seems to be the cause of docs.rs [build failure](https://docs.rs/crate/ashpd/latest).

candidates.title: desktop: Enforce Bytes icon variant for Dynamic Launcher portal
gtk: Switch back to main branch
demo: enable the ashpd pipewire feature
candidates.body:
Fixes
```
error[E0425]: cannot find function `pipewire_streams` in module `camera`
  --> src/portals/desktop/camera.rs:96:39
   |
96 |                 let streams = camera::pipewire_streams(stream_fd).await.unwrap();
   |                                       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ not found in `camera`

```
Missing the `Cargo.lock` changes though, see #149

candidates.title: gtk: Switch to git deps
candidates.body: To help with testing latest bindings

candidates.title: demo: Switch to new adwaita widgets
cargo: don't depend on zbus' async-io feature when we use tokio
Bump pipewire crate to 0.6
candidates.body: Fixes the compilation errors with pipewire 0.3.64 / 0.3.65 (#118).
